name: 洋流學
restrict: ◎限大三大四 ◎限碩一碩二碩三以上修習
description: 海洋中洋流對於全球熱平衡以及全球環境氣候變遷扮演著重要角色，此課程希望藉由介紹全球洋流分布型態、洋流在整個地球氣候系統中扮演的角色進行介紹，讓學生認識全球主要洋流型態以及其形成機制以及其對全球氣候變化扮演之角色。
goals: Introduction to principles and practice of ocean circulation.
syllabus:
Introduction to principles and practice of ocean circulation. The atmosphere and the ocean; energy transfer to the ocean by thermal, radiative and mechanical processes; the heat budget; oceanic boundary conditions; geographical distribution of oceanic properties; observational methods; air-sea interaction; global fluxes and general description of major ocean currents. Current systems near Taiwan.

Course Format  
The course will consist of two elements:   
1\. Classroom lectures and discussions   
2\. One project homework and one in-class exam  
Classroom lectures will cover and expand upon key concepts presented in the text. Exam will cover only the material presented in the classroom lectures.
